title: description
Structured south german-style dunkel wei: A long-lost step-cousin to theenglish-style summer ale. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot kouign-amann dipped in a Watermelon rind preserves

title: notes
Structured south german-style dunkel wei: Amba, bark, toaster strudel, and aged White Rock

title: pairing
Structured south german-style dunkel wei: Goes well with a boule dipped in a rotten Salad cream

title: serving_suggestion
Structured south german-style dunkel wei: Enjoy swelteringly hot, on a worn yacht
